alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Miami-Dade County through 200 PM EDT... At 115 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florida City, or near Homestead, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Turkey Point, Homestead General Airport, Homestead Miami Speedway, The Redland, Florida City, Homestead Base, Leisure City, Homestead Bayfront Park and Naranja. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County
